title: Bone Deep
description: The author of the national bestseller Criminal Seduction returns with a novel of harrowing suspense. A forensic anthropologist's life becomes a living nightmare when her father is found shot. In her search for the reasons why, she must unwillingly come face to face with her mysterious past. Now instead of finding answers, she finds herself stalked in a maze of passion, lies, betrayal and death where no one can be trusted.
author: Darian North
